advancedOptions.title: Configuration Options

previewChoice.title: Video Rendering Complete!

results.title: Content Generation Complete!
results.speedChangeNote: This will permanently change the playback speed of this video

steps.title: Pre-review Outline
steps.desc: Check and tweak the outline to make sure the next steps turn out well

steps.title: Analyze Core Themes
steps.desc: Understand and build the core knowledge framework of the course

steps.title: Build Content Outline
steps.desc: Organize the knowledge framework into an orderly chapter structure

steps.title: Course Planning Page
steps.desc: Design corresponding demonstration pages for each knowledge point

steps.title: Design page elements
steps.desc: Arrange specific text and content for each page

steps.title: Generate Visual Animation
steps.desc: Transform static page content into dynamic visual effects

steps.title: Write a lecture script
steps.desc: Generate professional voiceover scripts for course content

steps.title: Generate course voiceover
steps.desc: Convert the voiceover script into clear and fluent speech

steps.title: Set the scene rhythm
steps.desc: Intelligently arrange pauses and transitions for video content

steps.title: Optimize viewing experience
steps.desc: Automatically adjust the synchronization rhythm of animation and explanation

steps.title: Synchronize Audio and Video
steps.desc: Ensure that each frame of the picture is precisely matched with the sound

steps.title: Synthetic Background Elements
steps.desc: Add professional backgrounds and decorations to video content

steps.title: Generate video clip
steps.desc: Output the processed visual elements as independent video clips

steps.title: Series Course Content
steps.desc: Seamlessly connect all segments into a complete course

steps.title: Complete the final synthesis
steps.desc: Integrate the cover, content, and end credits into a complete course video

template.title: Page Template
template.doubleColDesc1: The double column template converts your Manim code into a two-column layout. The left side displays key concepts and text content, while the right side showcases graphics, formulas, or animated demonstrations.
template.doubleColDesc2: This template automatically preserves all logic from your original code (text content, mathematical formulas, graphics, animation sequence, waiting time, etc.), adjusting only the layout and formatting to make the presentation more harmonious and aesthetically pleasing.
template.doubleColDesc3: Suitable for educational scenarios requiring simultaneous presentation of theoretical explanations and visual demonstrations.
template.popoverContent: Templates only adjust layout and format, preserving all original content (text, formulas, graphics, animation sequence).

double_col.name: Classic Two-Column
double_col.description: Points and text content on the left, graphics, formulas, or animations on the right.

single_image.name: Central Image
single_image.description: Single image template, content centered around the core image with text description below.

double_image.name: Side-by-Side Images
double_image.description: Two images side-by-side template, suitable for comparison and analogy scenarios.

points_list.name: Key Points List
points_list.description: List-style layout, suitable for step-by-step explanations or listing important content.

blackboard.name: Blackboard
blackboard.description: Blackboard-style template, highlighting a single core concept or problem-solving process.

code_explanation.name: Code Annotation
code_explanation.description: Complete code on the left, corresponding annotation content on the right.

four_grid.name: Four-Grid
four_grid.description: Four-part template, suitable for displaying four sections of content.

coming_soon.name: More Templates
coming_soon.description: More layout styles coming soon, feedback welcome.
